author: tvami
body:
#### PR description:

This seems to be the last for for the DB output migration. Part of https://github.com/cms-AlCaDB/AlCaTools/issues/28
Incidentally I also move it to a `one` module and changed to `LogPrint`

The reason for [RFC] is that I couldn't make `gbreb`, `gbrebvar`, `gbree`, `gbreevar` into smart pointers because there is no conversion from the TBObject to the unique pointer of type `GBRForestD`

#### PR validation:

Code compiles.

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

N/A


cc. @swagata87
title: [RFC] Modernize / DB output migration of GBRWrapperMaker.cc
